metadata.title: CVE-2019-19063 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Two memory leaks in the rtl_usb_probe() function indrivers/net/wireless/realtek/rtlwifi/usb.c in the Linux kernel through5.3.11 allow attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption),aka CID-3f9361695113.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
